prompts: Create a cute electric-type Pokemon that can generate powerful shocks.
Imagine a Pikachu with a unique design featuring stripes and a lightning bolt tail.
Show me an adorable Pokemon that embodies happiness and energy, perfect for a starter.
Design a Pokemon that can harness electricity with bright yellow fur and playful eyes.
Generate an image of a small, agile Pokemon known for its speed and electric attacks.
Make a character inspired by Pikachu, with a twist of a different color palette and design.
Give me a depiction of a lively Pokemon that thrives in urban areas and loves to play.
